column1: https:/â€¦The Selati bridge is close to the Visitor Center of the Kruger National Park in Skukuza.

It was originally scheduled to open in June 2020, but the opening has been postponed until September 2020.This could be further postponed, due to Covid-19, because nobody knows when restrictions will be lifted .It has been predicted that Covid-19 will only peak in South Africa around September 2020
